lead_paragraph: The authorities in Madrid had tried to prohibit the Estelada, a Catalan flag that has become a symbol of a pro-independence movement.

headline.print_headline: Judge Rules Catalan Flag  May Fly at Final After All
headline.main: Ban on Catalan Flag at Spanish Soccer Final Is Overturned

snippet: The authorities in Madrid had tried to prohibit the Estelada, a Catalan flag that has become a symbol of a pro-independence movement.
abstract: Spanish judge rules that Catalan flag can be flown during Copa del Rey soccer final, overturning decision by Madrid authorities to ban what has become symbol of regional independence.
